input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Democratic Chino"
Reference Product Description:
Originally issued to American soldiers during WWII, the first military chinos were celebrated for their comfort, versatility, and impressive ruggedness. They proved so popular, in fact, that soldiers held onto their well-worn pairs even after discharge, and as more and more civilians took notice, the style became a fixture of garages and workshops as well as college campuses and city streets all across the country. Featuring 100% Responsible materials and an updated silhouette, The Foundation Pant is both a reinvention of our earlier chinos and an elevated reimagining of the all-purpose originals, built to help you start your day on solid ground. Because it's been garment dyed and washed, it has the character of a well-loved vintage piece, and it'll continue to pick up a ton of nuance with wear. Cool herringbone accents at the waistband and the pockets serve as a nod to the style's military origins. SPECIFICATIONS Classic medium rise, tailored fit, straight through the thigh with a slight taper from knee to leg opening. Available in 32" inseam. 8-oz. 100% organic cotton. 5-oz. 100% organic cotton herringbone pocketing. Garment dyed and washed for a vintage feel. Front slash pockets allow easy entry into pockets. Low-profile welt coin pocket inset at waistband. Two back welt pockets. 4-hole vintage military style button at waistband. YKK zipper fly. Bound fly and outseam. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China. Model is 6'1", wearing a 32.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Gavin Chino Pants'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Modern Slim Fit Straight Leg Chino'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Classic Fit Signature Khaki Lux Cotton Stretch Pants Pleated'
  - Name='Uniqlo Men's Straight Chino Pants'
  - Name='Kinetic Men's Pull-On Jogger Pants'
  - Name='Ministry of Supply Men's Kinetic Pull-On Pants'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit Stretch Cotton Trousers'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit Stretch Golf Trousers'
  - Name='Club Monaco Men's Micro Khakis Pants'
  - Name='Men's Slim Core Temp Chino'
  - Name='Man Dockers Original Slim Pants'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Aiden Chino Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's Pleated Wide Pants'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Athletic Slim-Fit Chino Pant'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's Utilitech Twill Relaxed Pleated Trousers'
  - Name='Uniqlo Men's Casual Flat Front Chino Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Commuter Pro Trouser'
  - Name='Club Monaco Connor Stretch Chino'
  - Name='Rhone Gotham Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Momentum Golf Five Pocket Plaid Pants'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Relaxed Tapered Chinos'
  - Name='Men's Slim-Straight Lived-In Chino'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Slim Brushed Stretch Chino Pants'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Golf Performance Tech Chino Stretch Pants'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Relaxed Fit Mid Rise Flat Chino Pants'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Gavin Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are men's chino pants similar in style and function to the reference product, likely with a comparable tailored fit and versatile use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Modern Slim Fit Straight Leg Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This competitor offers a slim fit straight leg chino, closely matching the tailored, slightly tapered silhouette of the reference chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Classic Fit Signature Khaki Lux Cotton Stretch Pants Pleated
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While these are cotton chino-style pants, the classic fit and pleated design differ from the tailored, vintage-inspired straight-tapered fit of the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Uniqlo Men's Straight Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight chino pants made of cotton, meeting the exact product type, silhouette, and function described in the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kinetic Men's Pull-On Jogger Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are jogger-style pull-on pants, which differ significantly from traditional chinos in silhouette and likely materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ministry of Supply Men's Kinetic Pull-On Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pull-on jogger style pants are distinct in silhouette and intended use from tailored chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit Stretch Cotton Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim-fit cotton trousers overlap with chinos in fabric and fit but often have a more technical or athleisure focus than classic chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit Stretch Golf Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Golf trousers are similar in fit to chinos but usually optimized with technical fabrics for sports, differing from the heritage chino style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Club Monaco Men's Micro Khakis Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Micro khakis are akin to chinos in fabric and form, matching the referenceâ€™s purpose and style fairly well.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Slim Core Temp Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A slim, temperature-regulating chino closely aligns with the reference product in garment type and fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Man Dockers Original Slim Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim pants by Dockers are close in style and construction to tailored chinos, though original slim fit may vary slightly from the described fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Aiden Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another slim-fit chino pant, highly similar in design, silhouette, and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: UNIQLO Men's Pleated Wide Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wide pleated pants differ considerably in silhouette from the tailored, tapered chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Athletic Slim-Fit Chino Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Athletic slim-fit chinos closely resemble the reference product in fit and fabric, appealing to similar customers.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's Utilitech Twill Relaxed Pleated Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Relaxed, pleated trousers differ in fit and construction from tailored chinos, oriented more towards comfort and technical use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Uniqlo Men's Casual Flat Front Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Flat front chinos from Uniqlo directly match the reference product's style, fit, and material focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Commuter Pro Trouser
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Technical commuter trousers may share some silhouette characteristics but differ in fabric and intended use compared to classic chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Club Monaco Connor Stretch Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Stretch chinos with a tailored fit closely parallel the reference chinos in material and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Gotham Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Rhone Gotham pants likely have a modern, technical fabric focus differing from the organic cotton classic chino style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Momentum Golf Five Pocket Plaid Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Golf pants with a plaid pattern and technical fabric diverge significantly from vintage-inspired chinos in construction and use.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Relaxed tapered chinos share similar fabric and construction but have a looser fit than the tailored reference chinos.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim-straight chinos with a worn-in feel strongly match the reference in style, fit, and fabric treatment.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Slim Brushed Stretch Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim brushed stretch chinos offer a similar fit and function, closely matching the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Golf Performance Tech Chino Stretch Pants
